comments.comment: RANJAN and President are under personal attack by those directly invoked with KUDU BUSINESS. This is no surprise to any intelligent person.LANZA is no exception as he is a well known citizen hailing from Negombo. A vice center in Gampaha district. HIRUNIKAS vote base comes from her late  father's friends. Her existence comes from the drug dealers. It is natural that she tries to malign the President who is spear heading the death penalty for drug dealers. This is the disgraceful life of our "GARU," Parliamentarians elected by the people. So my advice is to take care when you decide to elect MPs next time.
comments.author: Thilak Ranaweera

replies.replyComment: @Thilak Ranaweera Yes it is sad and unfortunate that they express their views such a low level language. I am blessed with having fairly good knowledge in all three languages. It's same even in Tamil language YouTube's . There must be a mechanisms to controls those comments in  filthy words.

@Thilak Ranaweera I am hailing from Kandy and studied in a Sinhala medium school . I have seen many dead bodies from both sides.  As you said it is history I am afraid it will not be repeated. Though I don't agree with JVP theory but still worth voting them to be a powerful opposition as  balancing act. Also it is deciplned party. At least you will have a satisfaction that we did not vote for rouges and uneducated fellows such as Kudukaroyas  and Kasippukaroys. I am too worried about my young kids the way things are heading to. May be we have to suffer have to due to Purwa Jannma  Karma in our great religion Buddhism/Hndusim ha ha

Ravi Chandra, I whole heartedly agree with you. But the million dollar question is "How to educate the voters? " and also whom to vote for? Both sides are full of corrupt thieves.Only party left and not tested is JVP. But frankly I am worried to give my vote to them. Believe me I have personally witnessed two dead bodies of youth who were killed in the suburbs of Kuliyapitya being carried by the villagers with dead bodies below the knees of the carriers as ordered by the,then leaders of JVP.I This of course is the history. But our situation as of today is extremely complex. Personally I have a great dislike towards both major parties, as the honesty and integrity of RW is severely shaken after the Bond scam. As Pohottuwa leaders have shown that they are corrupt beyond imagination, what can we do. As of me I am in twilight years of my life and do not care, but I am very worried about my children who are adults and  top professionals. But if they migrate they will loose the identity. This is our unfortunate dilemma.
@Thilak Ranaweera None else to blame but voters. We may have different political opinion  and we must educated members to parliament not Thugs and idiots..

First of all,every Sri Lankan should know that the person writing incognito as mentioned above is a parasite living in a Western country, trying hard to mis-lead the voting public of Sri Lanka about the political issues here.I say this because my message does not even imply that "we are making  every effort to cover Drug kingpins" as quoted by him This is totally  contrary to the text in my message.He is clearly trying to take away what ever credit due to the President for many serious detections of large drug imports after he took over the Law enforcing departments.This person U Gsk is ,in my view is insane and  He is strongly advised to see a psychiatrist, unless he is an Agent working for A political party for a fee.If not,he is a "LUDIAT" (lunatic+idiot).He has simply taken the wrong end of my text as any reader can see.The problem is that these people have received free education and left the country for greener pastures and trying hard to mis_direct our innocent civilians. This is typical behaviour of an traitorous and ungrateful character.
I SINCERELY HOPE THAT THESE FACTS WOULD BE ABSORBED BY OUR PEOPLE!

I am also very much disappointed the way Chair of the Assembly conducted this Session of the Supreme Legislative Body. Surely he could have adjourned the Session without allowing the disgraceful behaviour of so called Honourable Members to be exposed before the School children present at. the Gallery.
